title: Treasure Every Encounter, For It Will Never Recur.
description: You are "by the ocean" wherever you are, For Japan is surrounded by the ocean. Fish caught in the morning is on the table in the evening.

content.title: The Finest Sea Cuisine
content.description: The menu is based on Japanese style, a fusion of Asian and Western food. The dishes are mainly made from fish delivered directly from the sea by the owner

popular.description: Ebi no Ebi niyoru Ebi Sousu
popular.title: Prawn with prawn sauce
Grilled fresh fish with garlic, olive oil

about.title: Kaikaya By The Sea
about.description: In some country, there is a port town. In this tow, there is a restaurant. Owned by a mysterius Japanese man, who cooks marvelous seafood dishes.

review.title: My favorite Sea food restaurant in Japan!
review.description: I love this restaurant because it’s calm and authentic. The service is excellent and I’ve always enjoyed the variety of dishes they offer.
review.name: Satoshi Kimura
